name: Balance the Chance
description:
Keyboard Controls:

Move: A & D

Jump: Spacebar

Make Bet: Left Shift

Raise/Lower Bet: W or Up Arrow & S or Down Arrow

Enter Bet: Enter

Cancel Bet: Backspace or Delete

Gamepad controls (Xbox controller for reference):

Move: Left Stick

Jump: A

Make Bet: B

Raise Bet: Up Arrow (sorry, you cannot lower a bet on a controller)

Enter Bet: Y

Cancel Bet: X

Credits:

Lead Game Designer: Ben L

Lead Artist: Caleb L

Musician: Caleb L

Credits to Outside Sources:

 Font: Jovanny Lemonad

SFX: EminYILDIRIM, JustInvoke, qubodup, AUDACITIER, BrickDeveloper171, & nettimato

Premise:

The only way to kill enemies is by hitting them while you are in the air. When you kill an enemy, you gain bet points. You can spend those bet points by pressing Shift and incrementing the number of points you want to spend. The more points you bet, the larger the risk and the larger the reward. These are the dice results (x stands for the number of bet points spent):

1:  x speed removed

2: x strength removed

3: x health removed

4: x speed gained

5: x strength gained

6: x health gained

The goal of the game is to kill the boss at the end.

Story:

Board games. Card games. Even dice games. All of these reeked of a brewing discord. The queen has overruled the king in all but title and mustered a following of chess pieces to disturb the equilibrium of strategy and luck.  But no one has obtained the courage to stop her. Except for one lone die. It is up to you to depose the queen and...

Balance the Chance

How this Fits the Theme:

The theme of the GMTK 2022 Game Jam is: "Roll of the Dice" I have incorporated the theme in three ways:

1: The story is about a die

2: The only way to deal damage is by "rolling" on top of enemies.

3: In order to excel, you must take risks by spending bet points.

Thanks for hosting another great game jam.
